Description: Security controls to support SOC 2 readiness
Define roles and enforce server-side authorization
Acceptance Criteria: Role matrix defined; backend authorization checks added; access review report exportable
Evidence Required: Role matrix export; policy/config screenshots; audit logs; quarterly access review report

Description: Enforce MFA for privileged roles in IdP
Acceptance Criteria: MFA required; cannot bypass; recovery process documented
Evidence Required: IdP policy screenshot/export; user MFA export; test evidence

Description: Log critical actions with retention policy
Acceptance Criteria: Critical actions logged; retention >= 365d; searchable by user/time
Evidence Required: Sample log entries; retention settings; query exports

Acceptance Criteria: SCA runs on PR/merge; SLA documented; remediation tracked
Evidence Required: CI scan reports; tickets; remediation timelines

Description: Availability controls for uptime and incident handling
Dashboards and alert rules for core services
Acceptance Criteria: Dashboards exist; alert rules configured; on-call routing tested
Evidence Required: Dashboard screenshots; alert rule exports; test alert evidence

Description: Document and test incident response process
Acceptance Criteria: IR plan approved; tabletop exercise completed; postmortem template used
Evidence Required: IR plan doc; exercise notes; postmortem example

Description: Automate backups and run restore tests quarterly
Acceptance Criteria: Backups scheduled; restore test completed; RTO/RPO documented
Evidence Required: Backup configs; restore test logs; RTO/RPO doc

Acceptance Criteria: TLS 1.2+; HSTS enabled; secure cookies; no mixed content
Evidence Required: TLS config exports; security headers scan; LB/gateway config

Description: Encrypt DB at rest and store secrets in KMS
Acceptance Criteria: DB encryption enabled; secrets in KMS/Key Vault; rotation process
Evidence Required: Encryption settings; KMS policy exports; rotation logs

Description: Implement consent flags with auditable history
Acceptance Criteria: Consent toggles; consent history; exportable logs
Evidence Required: UI screenshots; schema; audit log exports
